# **BC Nurse Routing Engine ðŸš‘**

A high-performance, offline geospatial routing engine designed to optimize travel schedules for healthcare workers in British Columbia. Built on the **National Road Network (NRN)**, it solves the "Wilderness vs. Urban" routing challenge without relying on paid APIs.
